text: Antony Basker Raj (21 April 1925 - 23 August 2020), also known as A. B. Raj or A. Bhaskar Raj (in Sinhala Cinema), was an Indian director of Malayalam movies. He was born in Alappuzha, Travancore. He was known for directing Ormikkaan Omanikkaan, Manasse Ninakku Mangalam and Aval Oru Devaalayam. Raj died on 23 August 2020 in Chennai, Tamil Nadu from a heart attack at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Indian movie directors Category:Indian movie producers Category:Indian screenwriters Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: A. B. Raj
